channel.title: Web Scraping on Kaushal Jyanni

item.title: Cricket Data Scraper
item.description:
This project was undertaken by me during my intern period at SeeHow. The aim was to get speed data for various bowlers which can be later used for benchmarking in the product. The code gets data from bcci and ipl websites.

The backend uses selenium to get data from the websites and stores in a sqlite database. A query system was also made to get different kinds of data from the database. Then python framework flask was used to change the code into a webapp.

Feel free to contact me to know more.
